div.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; width: 753.328px; position: relative; min-height: 1px; float: left; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: center;

background: 0px 0px; border-top: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-bottom: 0px; border-image: initial; margin: 0px; padding: 35px 15px 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; width: 753.328px; border-left: 2px solid rgb(50, 61, 73) !important;
background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;
background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 35px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;
background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

p.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; line-height: 26px; text-align: left;
p.b: Top 10 Reasons that consistently cause Surplus products in the medical device marketplace.

div.style: background: 0px 0px rgb(50, 61, 73); border: 0px; margin: 24px 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; position: relative; height: 2px;
background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 35px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; padding-left: 18px !important; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;
background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

ol.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Surgeons depart and leave their preferred products behind.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Surgeons’ preferences change. Surgeons’ repeatedly change their preference for certain surgical products. More and more, the facilities are stuck with a remaining balance of un-used inventory.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Group Purchasing Organization’s change and new contracts dictate changes in products and OEMs. Oftentimes, the previous OEM’s inventory is left behind in the conversion.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: OEMs & distributors are making it more difficult to return products.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Technology changes and improves. OEMs are constantly releasing new technologies that cause old technology to become obsolete.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Your facility simply ceases to perform certain procedures.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: When your hospital switches OEMs, typically all other facilities in your network are switching to the same OEM.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: The Sales Reps for OEMs turnover and/or abandon the relationship.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Poor Inventory management (First In, First Out) / Ordering errors. Product is spread over too many locations to keep track of it all. Besides the O.R. Core and main supply area, product can be spread throughout the operation rooms, labs, and surgical carts.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; text-align: left;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

li.span: Your staff does not have the time to continually deal with surplus inventory
